title:
Automorphisms of Calabi-Yau threefolds from algebraic dynamics and the
  second Chern class
abstract:
This is a report of my talk at MFO after Cetraro this July consisting of more
speculations, rather than definite results, on automorphisms of strict
Calabi-Yau threefolds in the view of the question posed in my ICM report after
Dinh, Sibony and D.-Q. Zhang.
